thread.title: BRIEF-Propel Funeral Partners Says Unit Makes Takeover Offer For Norwood Park

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Propel Funeral Partners Says Unit Makes Takeover Offer For Norwood Park

organizations.name: brief-propel funeral partners says unit makes takeover offer for norwood park

text:
Jan 12 (Reuters) - Propel Funeral Partners Ltd:
* UNIT MADE TAKEOVER OFFER FOR ENTIRE ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL OF NORWOOD PARK FOR ENTERPRISE VALUE OF ABOUT $14.3 MILLION​
* PROPOSED ACQUISITION IS EXPECTED TO BE ACCRETIVE TO PROPEL‘S EARNINGS IN YEAR ONE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
